text: Peter Gunn (born 13 February 1963) is an English actor. He has appeared in many television series and films since his career began in 1988. Gunn is known for his role as Brian Packham in the long running ITV soap opera Coronation Street (2010–2013, 2015–present). == Other websites == * Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:Actors from Lancashire
title: Peter Gunn (actor)
